column4: What fryguy said... in the past it was not uncommon to build a custom linux kernel in order to get module support added in, etc.  However, ubuntu appears to have solved a lot of this.
will look at that right now all I am trying to do is get my fnkeys working lol
fryguy, this seems to give a concise overview of what pegon's trying to do: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/45021
